about_the_game:
Solateria is a 2D action Metroidvania game.

Analyze enemy patterns and execute precise parries as you venture through the world of Solateria with stylish fire-based action that burns everything in your path.

Story

You are a small fire-element "Litt," born into a world of Litt that has fallen to the Shadow Plague.
You awaken to the desperate voice of someone urging you to find the "Primordial Flame".

Embarking on a journey, you seek the Primordial Flame the only hope to save the world.

Who was the owner of that voice? Why has the world fallen into ruin? Perhaps the answers lie at the end of your quest, where the Primordial Flame awaits.

Game Features

Heat System

As a fire-element Pyron warrior, you can gather Heat through parries and Pyron Actions to unleash significantly more powerful attacks.

Engage in relentless combat and maintain your Heat level to enjoy non-stop, aggressive battles! Wherever you pass, everything will burn, leaving nothing behind...

Burn Everything!

Use the fire-element abilities of Pyron to burn creatures to ashes and defeat powerful bosses. Set objects in the field ablaze to uncover hidden rewards.

Parrying Fun and "Pyron Actions"

Learn enemy patterns and parry at the right moment. Successfully parry specific patterns to trigger one of several "Pyron Actions" and gain the upper hand in battle.

The Dark World of the "Litt"
Pyron, Ophilin, Zephiron, Mucora, and Terradin. In Solateria, the home of these five Litt tribes, the Shadow Plague has brought devastation. Embark on an adventure in a world of Litt that appears beautiful but harbors dark secrets.

Hand Drawn Map
Explore a vast world crafted with hand-drawn graphics. Discover hidden secrets, create shortcuts, and delve deeper into Solateria as you uncover the truth of the world.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 / Radeon HD 7800
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: In a world where the 'Litt' have perished, a small fire warrior embarks on a journey to find the "Primordial Flame" the only hope to save the world. Defeat powerful enemies, unleash fire attacks, and master parrying actions. Explore a beautifully hand-drawn world and uncover its hidden secrets.
